EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications - 2015.03.05.Email - Follow U
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications! In the webinar, Tricentis teamed up with Bill Martorelli, a Principal Analyst with Forrester Research to share strategies for enterprises testing applications deployed within SaaS platforms. Questions from the audience helped keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-strategies-for-testing-saas-applications-watch.html>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Bill Martorelli Principal Analyst Forrester Research
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer Tricentis
